    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Dog​(Pound pound, java.lang.String name)
      Constructor receives two parameters and creates new dog Uses default values for additional properties

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addIssue​(java.lang.String issue)
      Method that allows users to add something to the dog's description
      void attack()
      Plays a growl sound for the dog, and updates stats to indicate increased aggression
      void bark()
      Plays a bark sound for the dog, and plays a different sound depending on the dog's weight
      void eat()
      Method so dog can eat; Dog can only eat if their hunger level is greater than zero, and if dog eats, weight changes
      int getAge()
      Getter method that returns dog's age
      int getAggressionLevel()
      Getter method that returns dog's aggression level
      java.lang.String getBreed()
      Getter method that returns dog's breed
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDescription()
      Getter method that returns dog description
      int getEnergyLevel()
      Getter method that returns dog's energy level
      java.lang.String getFurColor()
      Getter method that returns dog's color
      java.lang.String getGender()
      Getter method that returns dog's gender
      double getHeight()
      Getter method that returns dog's height
      int getHungerLevel()
      Getter method that returns dog's hunger level
      boolean getIsFixed()
      Getter method that returns dog's fixed status
      boolean getIsTrained()
      Getter method that returns dog's trained status
      java.lang.String getName()
      Getter method that returns dog's name
      Pound getPound()
      Getter method that returns dog's pound
      double getWeight()
      Getter method that returns dog's weight
      void pee()
      Shows pee picture and updates energy and weight, then returns to default picture
      void poop()
      Shows poop picture and updates energy and weight, then returns to default picture
      void removeIssue​(java.lang.String issue)
      Method that allows users to remove something from the dog's description
      void run​(int howLong)
      Plays panting sound, and plays running animation for the amount of time the dog runs Stats change accordingly while the dog is running
      void setAge​(int age)
      Allows user to set the dog's age to whatever they want between 0 and 30
      void setAggressionLevel​(int aggressionLevel)
      Allows user to set the dog's aggression level to whatever they want between 0 and 100
      void setBreed​(java.lang.String breed)
      Allows user to set the dog's breed to whatever they want
      void setEnergyLevel​(int energyLevel)
      Allows user to set the dog's energy level to whatever they want between 0 and 100
      void setFurColor​(java.lang.String furColor)
      Allows user to set the dog's fur color to whatever they want
      void setGender​(java.lang.String gender)
      Allows user to set the dog's gender to either male or female
      void setHeight​(double height)
      Allows users to set dog's height to any number between 3 and 48 inches
      void setHungerLevel​(int hungerLevel)
      Allows user to set the dog's hunger level to whatever they want between 0 and 100
      void setIsFixed​(boolean isFixed)
      Allows users to update dog's fixed status
      void setIsTrained​(boolean isTrained)
      Allows users to update dog's trained status
      void setName​(java.lang.String name)
      Allows user to set the dog's name to whatever they want
      void setPound​(Pound pound)
      Allows user to set the dog's pound to whatever they want
      void setWeight​(double weight)
      Allows users to set dog's weight to any number between 0.5 and 400 pounds
      void sit()
      Displays dog's default picture
      void sleep()
      Dog sleeps until its energy level is at 100, and it cannot sleep if its energy level is at 100 When sleeping, hunger increases and aggression decreases
      java.lang.String toString()
      Makes a dog a string
